about_the_game:
HÜDDAM 2 BERZAH

It is an open world game that reflects Turkish culture.
It has a structure where you can engage in the act of researching and solving events.
This game, which is in the horror genre, will lead you to tension, fear and adventure while offering atmospheric environments.
You are a religious man, you are helpful.
So do you have the courage to solve things?

ENVIRONMENT

Fantastic Places, Mysterious, Exciting Moments,
You will embark on a dark and gloomy investigation in a Turkish village, and you will be tense with the integrity of the sounds in the atmosphere.

TOPIC

Ahmet Hodja, who has mastered the science of Havas
As Hüddam, he brought many cases to light.
A married couple lives in a village called Kıbledere. You will investigate the reason why strange events constantly occur in the abandoned village. It is about the story of Hamza and Hatice.

WARNING

The game contains blood and violence in hellish scenes.
More horror themes are discussed.
Sound and Image May Be Disturbing,
Sudden Images May Cause Panic Attacks.

NOTE:

There is no anti-religion-blasphemy-sexuality-humiliation-or ill-will in the game.
The game was developed by one person.
In this story-oriented game, there will be puzzles and objects that you need to solve and find, and you can progress by following the clues.

content_descriptors.notes: It contains blood, violence, and psychological situations.
